data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 184,312 believers in the county of Lincang to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lincang, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lincang with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 181 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Lincang, Yunnan, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Lincang, Yunnan, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 184,312 believers in the county of Lincang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Zaiwa people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Lincang against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, help the 184,312 believers in Lincang to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,245,288 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lincang, Yunnan, China has a population of 2,429,600.

We estimate Lincang has 184,312 people who might know Jesus, 39,250 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,206,038 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Lincang to agree with you and with one another.
